com.facebook.litho.animation

Interface AnimationBinding

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BezierTransition, DelayBinding, ParallelBinding, SequenceBinding, SpringTransition, TimingTransition, TransitionAnimationBinding

    public interface AnimationBinding
    An animation or set of animations using GraphBindings. In start(com.facebook.litho.animation.Resolver), subclasses can use the provided Resolver instance to reference concrete mount item properties when creating the GraphBinding.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(AnimationBindingListener animationBindingListener)
      Adds a AnimationBindingListener.
      void collectTransitioningProperties(java.util.ArrayList<PropertyAnimation> outList)
      Collects the set of PropertyAnimations that this animation will animate.
      java.lang.Object getTag()
      Allows adding a tags that can also be used to store data without resorting to another data structure.
      boolean isActive() 
      void prepareToStartLater()
      Called when binding is to be started later.
      void removeListener(AnimationBindingListener animationBindingListener)
      Removes a previously added AnimationBindingListener.
      void setTag(java.lang.Object tag) 
      void start(Resolver resolver)
      Starts this animation.
      void stop()
      Stops this animation.

    • Method Detail

      • prepareToStartLater

        void prepareToStartLater()
        Called when binding is to be started later. For example: when a set of bindings starts, but this particular binding will come into play later. This may be called multiple times in case of several nested sets

      • start

        void start(Resolver resolver)
        Starts this animation. The provided Resolver instance can be used to configure this animation appropriately using mount content property current and end values.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops this animation.

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Returns:
        whether this animation is running

      • collectTransitioningProperties

        void collectTransitioningProperties(java.util.ArrayList<PropertyAnimation> outList)
        Collects the set of PropertyAnimations that this animation will animate. This is used to make sure before/after values are recorded and accessible for the animation. Implementations should add their animating properties to this set.

        Note: This is a 'collect' call instead of a getter to allocating more sets then necessary for animations with nested animation (e.g. a sequence of animations). Yay Java.

      • addListener

        void addListener(AnimationBindingListener animationBindingListener)
        Adds a AnimationBindingListener.

      • removeListener

        void removeListener(AnimationBindingListener animationBindingListener)
        Removes a previously added AnimationBindingListener.

      • getTag

        java.lang.Object getTag()
        Allows adding a tags that can also be used to store data without resorting to another data structure. *

      • setTag

        void setTag(java.lang.Object tag)
